name: Jessica Martinez
summary: Former marketing professional transitioning to UX Design with completed bootcamp certification and portfolio of projects. Strong background in user research, storytelling, and cross-functional collaboration. Eager to leverage marketing insights to create user-centered design solutions.

experience.title: Freelance UX/UI Designer
responsibilities: Designed website and mobile app mockups for 3 small business clients
Conducted user interviews and usability testing to inform design decisions
Created wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs using Figma
Collaborated with developers to ensure design implementation quality

experience.title: Digital Marketing Manager
responsibilities: Managed digital marketing campaigns across email, social media, and paid ads
Analyzed customer behavior using Google Analytics to optimize conversion funnels
Conducted A/B tests on landing pages, improving conversion rate by 25%
Led website redesign project working closely with design agency
Created customer personas based on market research and data analysis

experience.title: Marketing Coordinator
responsibilities: Supported marketing campaigns and content creation
Managed social media accounts and community engagement
Coordinated marketing events and trade show participation

projects: Fitness App Redesign - Improved user onboarding flow
E-commerce Checkout Optimization - Reduced cart abandonment
Local Restaurant Booking App - Mobile-first design
